title: Dremio Software Authentication
description: Authentication configuration for self-hosted Dremio Software using username and password. Dremio Software is deployed on-premises or in your own cloud infrastructure.

hostPort.title: Host and Port
hostPort.description: URL to your self-hosted Dremio Software instance, including protocol and port (e.g., http://localhost:9047 or https://dremio.example.com:9047).

username.title: Username
username.description: Username for authenticating with Dremio Software. This user should have appropriate permissions to access metadata.

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for the Dremio Software user account.
